alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln; Monroe (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 10:28PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Bradley, southeastern Cleveland, northwestern Desha, east central Calhoun, southeastern Monroe, northern Drew, eastern Jefferson, Lincoln and Arkansas Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1026 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Altheimer to Linwood to near Herbine to near Harrell. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monticello... Warren... Dumas... Star City... Hampton... Gould... Gillett... Wilmar... Grady... Mitchellville... Almyra... Harrell... St. Charles... Winchester... Whitefield... Plantersville... Hampton Municipal Airport... Little Bayou Meto Park... Weeks... Woodville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Arkansas; Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Desha; Drew; Jefferson; Lincoln; Monroe
